_header: All gold Jonette is thine hair
_description: ‘Ionet and Iankyn’, a dance refrain — five monorhyming lines

BodRawD913.First Lines:
Al gold Ionet is þin her[ ] Ionet is þin her[ ]
                    þin Iankyn [ ] Iankyn leman…
